scripts.setup-first: npm run docker-compose && npm run express && npm run install:prisma && npm run docker:rabbitmq && npm run bcrypt
scripts.setup: net start RemoteRegistry && sc config RemoteRegistry start= auto npm run docker-compose && npm run express && npm run install:prisma && npm run docker:rabbitmq && npm run bcrypt && npm run start
scripts.install:prisma: npm install @prisma/client && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
